Maing | studio = | distributor = | released = 2008 | runtime = 81 minutes | country = United States | language = English | budget = | gross = }} '''''Lioness''''' is a 2008 [[documentary film]] directed by Meg McLagan and Daria Sommers.{{cite web|work=[[USA Today]]|url=http://usatoday30.usatoday.com/life/television/news/2008-11-12-lioness_N.htm|title='Lioness' documentary hunts down women's role in Iraq war|date=2008-11-14|author=Gary Strauss}}{{cite web|author=Katie Herrell|date=2009-11-05|work=[[DVD Verdict]]|title=Lioness|url=http://www.dvdverdict.com/reviews/lioness.php}} ==Overview== The story of the first [[women in the military]] in United States history to be sent into direct combat. ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *{{official website|http://www.lionessthefilm.com}} *[http://www.pbs.org/independentlens/lioness/ PBS] *{{IMDb title|1202749}} [[Category:2008 films]] [[Category:American documentary films]] [[Category:English-language films]] {{documentary-film-stub}}
